attributes.action: Stop paying drug users and alcholics incapacity benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Drug users and Alcholics get more benefits:-

Some 100,000 drug users and alcoholics are claiming state handouts on the grounds that their habit is a disability and so get incapacity benefit. This means that nearly 1 in 25 of the 2.64million claiming Incapacity Benefit say they are too ill to work due to drink or drugs. Incapacity benefit is worth alot more than job seekers allowance. Incapacity benefit should be alot less than job seekers allowance as job seekers need to make phone calls etc

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop paying drug users and alcholics incapacity benefit."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
